HotelInfo.Name: Four Seasons Hotel Seattle
HotelInfo.Description: Offering modern luxury in an ideal downtown setting, Four Seasons Hotel Seattle is across from the Seattle Art Museum, 1 block from the Pike Place Market, and a five-minute walk from the waterfront.

RoomType.Description: One King Bed, City View, Accessible - 20% OFF

HotelInfo.Name: Fairmont Olympic Hotel
HotelInfo.Description: Built on the original site of the University of Washington, this grand hotel is just a few blocks from the Seattle Art Museum, Pacific Place shops, the Pike Place Market, and the convention center.

RoomType.Description: Fairmont Room, 1 King Bed, Non Smoking - Stay Longer Save More

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel 1000
HotelInfo.Description: The Pike Place Market, Seattle Art Museum, Financial District, and Seattle's attraction-filled waterfront are all within 2 blocks of this stylish contemporary hotel on bustling First Avenue. Â

HotelInfo.Name: Pan Pacific Seattle
HotelInfo.Description: This Seattle hotel is situated above a Whole Foods Market on the edge of downtown, 4 blocks from downtown shopping, a half mile from Seattle Center and within a mile of Pike Place Market. The New Chihully Museum of Glass is also within easy reach.

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Hyatt Seattle
HotelInfo.Description: This 30-story downtown Seattle hotel is two blocks from the upscale Pacific Place Mall and within seven blocks of cultural attractions. The hotel is adjacent to the Washington State Convention Center.

HotelInfo.Name: Inn at the Market
HotelInfo.Description: Located within downtown Seattle's historic Pike Place Market and surrounded by shops and cafÃ©s, Inn at the Market sits on a cobblestone street overlooking picturesque Elliott Bay and Puget Sound. Â

HotelInfo.Name: Hyatt At Olive 8
HotelInfo.Description: This hotel is in downtown Seattle, a block from the Paramount Theatre, two blocks from Pacific Place shopping, and just over one-half mile from Pike Place Market.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Andra
HotelInfo.Description: This family-friendly Seattle hotel is located in a shopping district, within a 10-minute walk of Westlake Center and Pike Place Market. Space Needle and Washington State Convention Center are also within 15 minutes.

HotelInfo.Name: The Arctic Club Seattle - a DoubleTree by Hilton
HotelInfo.Description: Located in Pioneer Square, this hotel is within a 5-minute walk of Smith Tower and Columbia Center. Pike Place Market and CenturyLink Field are also within 15 minutes.

RoomType.Description: One King Bed, Non-Smoking, Roll In Shower

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Monaco Seattle, a Kimpton Hotel
HotelInfo.Description: This fashionable Seattle hotel is 3 blocks from the Seattle Art Museum and within 7 blocks of Pacific Place and Westlake Center shopping, Pike Place Market, and the monorail. Â Â Â Â

HotelInfo.Name: Alexis Hotel, a Kimpton Hotel
HotelInfo.Description: This downtown Seattle charmer is in a historic building 1 block east of the waterfront and ferry terminal, and 4 blocks from Pike Place Market and Pioneer Square.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Vintage, a Kimpton Hotel
HotelInfo.Description: This 11-story boutique hotel in downtown Seattle is 2 blocks from the 5th Avenue Theatre and within 6 blocks of downtown shopping, the Seattle Art Museum, and the Washington State Convention Center.

HotelInfo.Name: Sheraton Seattle Hotel
HotelInfo.Description: This 35-story hotel rises above Seattle's shopping and entertainment district, within two blocks of the Paramount and 5th Avenue theaters and adjacent to the convention center.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Sorrento
HotelInfo.Description: Located on Seattle's First Hill, this Italian Renaissance-inspired hotel is 7 blocks from the Washington State Convention Center in downtown Seattle and 12 blocks from Pike Place Market.

HotelInfo.Name: Seattle Marriott Waterfront
HotelInfo.Description: Just one half-block from downtown's vibrant Pike Place Market, this hotel is across the street from cruise-ship piers, the waterfront promenade, the Bell Harbor Conference Center, and Elliott Bay. Â

HotelInfo.Name: The Edgewater - A Noble House Hotel
HotelInfo.Description: Extending over Elliott Bay from Pier 67, this 1962 landmark is adjacent to the Bell Harbor Conference Center and less than a mile from the Pike Place Market and the Space Needle.

HotelInfo.Name: MotifÂ Seattle
HotelInfo.Description: Located in Downtown Seattle, this hotel is within a 10-minute walk of 5th Avenue Theater, Pike Place Market, and Washington State Convention Center. Space Needle and Columbia Center are also within 1 mi (2 km).

HotelInfo.Name: The Westin Seattle
HotelInfo.Description: Featuring 2 towers, this downtown hotel is 2 blocks from Pacific Place and Westlake Center shops, 5 blocks from Pike Place Market, and 1 mile from the Space Needle.

HotelInfo.Name: Renaissance Seattle - a Marriott family hotel
HotelInfo.Description: This 28-story hotel is one block from the Seattle Public Library and within seven blocks of the convention center, Pacific Place and Westlake Center shops, and the Seattle Art Museum.

HotelInfo.Name: W Seattle
HotelInfo.Description: The 26-story W is a beacon welcoming the urban, urbane and contemporary to their refuge in Seattleâ€™s cultural core. In the heart of downtown, W Seattle is close to art and music centers, financial and retail hubs, and the Pike Place Market.

HotelInfo.Name: Palladian, a Kimpton Hotel
HotelInfo.Description: Located in Downtown Seattle, this hotel is within a 5-minute walk of Original Starbucks and Pike Place Market. Space Needle and Washington State Convention Center are also within 1 mi (2 km).

HotelInfo.Description: Located in Downtown Seattle, this condo is within a 10-minute walk of Seattle Paramount Theatre and Washington State Convention Center. Pike Place Market and Space Needle are also within 1 mi (2 km).

HotelInfo.Description: Located in Downtown Seattle, this condo is within a 10-minute walk of Pacific Science Center, Space Needle, and Experience Music Project Museum. Seattle Center and Marion Oliver McCaw Hall are also within 15 minutes.

HotelInfo.Description: Located in South Lake Union, this condo is within a 15-minute walk of Denny Park and Space Needle. Pike Place Market and Experience Music Project Museum are also within 1 mi (2 km).

HotelInfo.Name: The Paramount Hotel
HotelInfo.Description: This 11-story hotel is one block from the Paramount Theater, Pacific Place shops, or the Washington State Convention Center, and 3 blocks from Westlake Center.

HotelInfo.Name: Crowne Plaza Seattle - Downtown
